name: Amelia's Adventure
description:
NOTE: The Trailer has a video being played during Gura's Chapter songs. This is only for the "Windows" version which isn't released yet. The web browser version will unfortunately only be a still image.

---------------------------------------------------------------

This is a fan game made under the Cover Corps "Derivative Works Guidelines." I am in no way affiliated with Cover Corporation or Hololive production.

A game made for the Hololive VTuber Ninomae Ina'nis. Made to hopefully fulfill the dream that Ina is too busy for.

---------------------------------------------------------------
